bioAsHtml: Fran Perez is a Senior Software Engineer at 47 Degrees with strong experience in Data driven solutions and expertise in the Scala, Akka, and Spark platforms. He began his career as PHP/Python developer with extensive knowledge of Unix systems. Fran transitioned to using Scala when he began learning Functional Programming languages and concepts. In his spare time, Fran enjoys photography, watching various television series, and reading as many books as he can.

acceptedTalks.title: The three paths of Scaling with Akka.
